  physical_appearance: This is a white silk garment. It has a mandarin collar and frog buttons. It is long-sleeved. There are no patterns or embroidery seen.

  subject_terms_1: cultural ceremonies tops (garments
 general) Peranakan wedding clothes

  subject_terms_2: Rites and ceremonies Ethnic costume Peranakan (Asian people) Wedding costume

  subject_terms_3: Peranakan costumes

  sgcool_label_text: This silk Chiu Thau has a mandarin collar and frog buttons. It would have been worn by the groom during the hair combing ceremony
 which takes place on the first day of the twelve-day wedding celebrations. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This silk Chiu Thau has a mandarin collar and frog buttons. It would have been worn by the groom during the hair combing ceremony, which takes place on the first day of the twelve-day wedding celebrations. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
